Title: Chapter XI: Monkey Leaps Through Mist
Writer: Alfred Gough (created by), Miles Millar (created by), LaToya Morgan
Actors: Daniel Wu, Orla Brady, Sarah Bolger, Aramis Knight
Plot: Sunny and Bajie get help from an unlikely source, but it comes with a price. The Widow considers a risky gambit, while MK enacts a dangerous plan.
